com.omerozer.knit

Class Knit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.omerozer.knit.Knit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KnitInterface

    public class Knit
extends java.lang.Object
implements KnitInterface
    Main instance of Knit framework. Implements KnitInterface to provide shared objects such as ViewEvents & UsageGraph. Holds an Application instance for resources that need it such as KnitAppListener.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private MessagePool messagePool
      Shared MessagePool instance that handles recycling of KnitMessages.
      private MessageTrain messageTrain
      Shared MessageTrain instance that carries messages from one KnitPresenter to another.
      private ModelManager modelManager
      Shared ModelManager instance.
      private ModelMapInterface modelMap
      Shared ModelMapInterface instance generated by KnitProcessor.
      private KnitNavigator navigator
      Shared KnitNavigator instance that provides KnitPresenters with inter presenter navigation.
      private SchedulerProvider schedulerProvider
      Shared SchedulerProvider instance .
      private UsageGraph userGraph
      Shared UsageGraph instance that holds dependency maps and EntityInstances for components.
      private ViewEvents viewEvents
      Shared ViewEvents instance that allows KnitViews to fire events back to their KnitPresenters.
      private ViewToPresenterMapInterface viewToPresenterMap
      Shared ViewToPresenterMapInterface instance generated by KnitProcessor.

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        private static Knit instance
        Singleton instance of Knit.

      • knitModelLoader

        private KnitModelLoader knitModelLoader
        Shared KnitModelLoader instance. Used by UsageGraph.

      • knitPresenterLoader

        private KnitPresenterLoader knitPresenterLoader
        Shared KnitPresenterLoader instance. Used by UsageGraph.

      • knitUtilsLoader

        private KnitUtilsLoader knitUtilsLoader
        Shared KnitUtilsLoader instance. Used by Knit to initialize ViewToPresenterMapInterface and ModelMapInterface.

      • userGraph

        private UsageGraph userGraph
        Shared UsageGraph instance that holds dependency maps and EntityInstances for components.

      • schedulerProvider

        private SchedulerProvider schedulerProvider
        Shared SchedulerProvider instance . Provides SchedulerInterfaces to InternalModels.

      • modelManager

        private ModelManager modelManager
        Shared ModelManager instance. All active InternalModels are registered here. All data requests also go through here.

      • navigator

        private KnitNavigator navigator
        Shared KnitNavigator instance that provides KnitPresenters with inter presenter navigation.

      • app

        private java.lang.ref.WeakReference<android.app.Application> app
        Application instance required by resources such as KnitAppListener.

      • viewEvents

        private ViewEvents viewEvents
        Shared ViewEvents instance that allows KnitViews to fire events back to their KnitPresenters.

      • messagePool

        private MessagePool messagePool
        Shared MessagePool instance that handles recycling of KnitMessages. Used by KnitNavigator via KnitPresenter.

      • messageTrain

        private MessageTrain messageTrain
        Shared MessageTrain instance that carries messages from one KnitPresenter to another.

      • modelMap

        private ModelMapInterface modelMap
        Shared ModelMapInterface instance generated by KnitProcessor. Contains all dependency data for Models/

      • viewToPresenterMap

        private ViewToPresenterMapInterface viewToPresenterMap
        Shared ViewToPresenterMapInterface instance generated by KnitProcessor. Contains all dependency data for Presenters and Views.

      • releaseViewFromComponent

        void releaseViewFromComponent(java.lang.Object viewObject)
        Tells UsageGraph to detach View object from it's dependencies. Dependencies will not be killed. A use case for this is Configuration changes on an Activity,
        Parameters:
        viewObject - given view object.

      • destroyComponent

        void destroyComponent(java.lang.Object viewObject)
        Tells UsageGraph to release and destroy if needed all dependency instances a given View object,
        Parameters:
        viewObject - given view object.
